pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw:
after merging two similar PR's, this branch brings us down to 30 cppcheck errors:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/657/cppcheckResult/
content.html:
after merging two similar PR's, this branch brings us down to 30 cppcheck errors:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/657/cppcheckResult/

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: I have the next branch lined up that will finish off the rest of the cppcheck warnings as soon as this one is merged
content.html: I have the next branch lined up that will finish off the rest of the cppcheck warnings as soon as this one is merged

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: Curious about the motivation for keeping this one
content.html: Curious about the motivation for keeping this one

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw:
there's a compiler error in the following line if we make this explicit:

* #!/osrf/gazebo/src/26073a5dcf34878157b5e25d0730835db9a397df/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#PresetManager.cc-277

so I gave it an exception
content.html:
there's a compiler error in the following line if we make this explicit:

  • #!/osrf/gazebo/src/26073a5dcf34878157b5e25d0730835db9a397df/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#PresetManager.cc-277

so I gave it an exception

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: I see, how about changing that line to something like `this->dataPtr->currentPreset = physics::Preset(_name);`?
content.html: I see, how about changing that line to something like this->dataPtr->currentPreset = physics::Preset(_name);?

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw:
that would work too; my logic was to make them all explicit unless the implicit constructor was actually being used and it seemed reasonable

I could go either way. What do you think @caguero ? Break the tie
content.html:
that would work too; my logic was to make them all explicit unless the implicit constructor was actually being used and it seemed reasonable

I could go either way. What do you think @caguero ? Break the tie

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: I'm not sure about @chapulina 's suggestion. `currentPreset` is a `string`, right?
content.html: I'm not sure about @chapulina 's suggestion. currentPreset is a string, right?

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: oh that's true. humm then maybe the compiler error happens somewhere else?
content.html: oh that's true. humm then maybe the compiler error happens somewhere else?

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw:
It's this line:

#!/osrf/gazebo/src/26073a5dcf34878157b5e25d0730835db9a397df/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#PresetManager.cc-402
content.html:
It's this line:

#!/osrf/gazebo/src/26073a5dcf34878157b5e25d0730835db9a397df/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#PresetManager.cc-402

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw:
yeah, my mistake

I had seen it earlier then tried to guess where it was without testing

so @caguero you'd prefer changing the cpp code and marking the constructor as explicit?
content.html:
yeah, my mistake

I had seen it earlier then tried to guess where it was without testing

so @caguero you'd prefer changing the cpp code and marking the constructor as explicit?

pullrequest.title: Mark many physics constructors as explicit, suppress one cppcheck warning

content.raw: To me the cpp code is more clear as `this->dataPtr->presetProfiles.emplace(_name, Preset(_name));`. Same as @chapulina . But I would also add the explicit unless there's a specific use case.
content.html: To me the cpp code is more clear as this->dataPtr->presetProfiles.emplace(_name, Preset(_name));. Same as @chapulina . But I would also add the explicit unless there's a specific use case.
